title: 5Toubun No Hanayome - Magical Girl Raiha With The Quintuplet Of Witch
alternative_title: Mahou Shoujo Majikaru Raiha ; Mahou Shoujo Majikaru Raiha with The Quintuplet of Witch ; 魔法少女マジカルらいは ; 魔法少女マジカルらいは with The Quintuplet of Witch
status: Mahou Shoujo Majikaru Raiha ; Mahou Shoujo Majikaru Raiha with The Quintuplet of Witch ; 魔法少女マジカルらいは ; 魔法少女マジカルらいは with The Quintuplet of Witch
description:
Description :
        Upon meeting The Quintuplets of Witches in an unexpected turn of events, Uesugi Raiha, who lives with her father and her black cat Fuutarou, became Magical Girl Raiha - the protector of peace in her city?!
